title: Icosa Globes
content: [](http://photos1.blogger.com/blogger/1134/545/1600/icosaglobes.jpg)student projects suspended from the classroom ceiling(photo by K. Urner)Sixth graders in Portland study plate tectonics (Pangea, subduction plates, geological stratification, volcanoes and earthquakes) using these paper fold-up globes.
author: Kirby Urner
